name: GEOS: Golden Edge of the Sun
name_original: GEOS: Golden Edge of the Sun
description:
While terraforming for ACME Corp, a strange phenomena occurs which begins drying up all the planets water. Your mission, find resources to upgrade your cobbled together space ship, seek out comets, and bring back the precious liquid to re-green the world, and save your jobs!

Controls: Everything is done with your mouse, press ESC to close the game. Right click thrusts, left click shoots, change weapon with scroll.
